contentrichtext.text: The '''International Socialists''' ({{lang-sv|Internationella Socialister}}) is a [[Trotskyist]] organisation in [[Sweden]]. It is part of the [[International Socialist Tendency]] and publishes a paper called Gnistan (Spark). It was formed in 2002 by two members of the British [[Socialist Workers Party (Britain)|Socialist Workers Party]] who moved to Sweden. Early in 2010 they renamed their paper Antikapitalist. [[Category:International Socialist Tendency]] [[Category:Trotskyist organisations of Sweden]] {{Euro-socialist-party-stub}} {{Sweden-party-stub}}
